item.description:
This week we will focus on body awareness. Being aware of different sensations in the body is an essential skill for stress management. We will spend most of the session practicing a "body scan meditation". It is a quite long meditation 30-40 min that will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated! This exercise is a main component of a mindfulness based stress reduction program developed 30 years ago by Jon Kabat-Zinn. It has been shown beneficial to people suffering both from both psychological as well as physical distress.

I am looking forward to seeing you all!


Time: 4-5pm
Cost: $5 per session
Location: 675 Massachusetts Ave.,
11th Floor
Cambridge, MA

Location Info: It is a tall, white/gray building at the corner of Mass Ave and Prospect St., right next to 'Central' (red line) T stop. When you enter the lobby, please take the elevator to 11th Floor, then take your left when exiting the elevator and go till the end of the hall. If you have any trouble finding me please call 617-784-4534.
item.name: Stress Reduction and Relaxation Group Meetup
